name: Live My Journey
overview:
Live My Journey is your bookmark for the real world to save and share the Places You Love.

Every week, You experience places that you love or that you want to visit. How do you save them? How do you exchange recommendations with friends who travel to somewhere you’ve been or when you travel?

We want you to not forget that place you had the amazing brunch at 4 years ago in Paris and be able to share it with your friends when they go there.

Live My Journey is a place to share your journey through life via the places you love.

It’s not about rating places and leaving reviews, it’s just a simple and beautiful way to share and save places you love. The ones you would recommend to a friend visiting.

It’s about keeping a record of all the places you’ve loved on your travels and where you live. For you to simply look back at your list and reminisce about the great times you’ve had there.

Our Goal: Make saving and sharing place you love fast, easy and beautiful.
